com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.dom

Interface SearchContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DOMDocument, DOMElement, DOMFormControlElement, DOMFormElement, DOMFrameElement, DOMInputElement, DOMNode, DOMOptionElement, DOMSelectElement, DOMTextAreaElement 

    public interface SearchContext
    Base interface for search methods that must be inherited by DOM interfaces that want to have search mechanisms.
    搜索方法的基本接口，必须由要具有搜索机制的DOM接口继承。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XPathResult evaluate(java.lang.String expression)
      Evaluates an XPath expression for the document element with XPathResultType.ANY_TYPE and returns the result.
      使用XPathResultType.ANY_TYPE评估文档元素的XPath表达式并返回结果。
      XPathResult evaluate(java.lang.String expression, XPathResultType type)
      Returns an XPathResult based on an XPath expression and other given parameters.
      根据XPath表达式和其他给定参数返回XPathResult。
      DOMElement findElement(By method)
      Finds first DOM element in the current document or element with the given method.
      使用给定方法在当前文档或元素中查找第一个DOM元素。
      java.util.List<DOMElement> findElements(By method)
      Finds all DOM elements in the current document or element with the given method.
      使用给定的方法查找当前文档或元素中的所有DOM元素。

    • Method Detail

      • findElements

        java.util.List<DOMElement> findElements(By method)
        Finds all DOM elements in the current document or element with the given method. Returns empty list if there's no DOM elements were found with the given find method.
        使用给定的方法查找当前文档或元素中的所有DOM元素。如果使用给定的find方法找不到DOM元素，则返回空列表。
        Parameters:
        method - one of the predefined search methods you can obtain via By class. Cannot be null. -您可以通过课程获得的预定义搜索方法之一。不可能是 。
        Returns:
        a list of DOM elements that were found using given find method or empty collection if no elements were found. 使用给定的find方法找到的DOM元素列表；如果未找到任何元素，则返回空集合。

      • findElement

        DOMElement findElement(By method)
        Finds first DOM element in the current document or element with the given method. Returns null if element wasn't found using given find method.
        使用给定方法在当前文档或元素中查找第一个DOM元素。如果使用给定的find方法找不到元素，则返回null。
        Parameters:
        method - one of the predefined search methods you can obtain via By class. Cannot be null. -您可以通过课程获得的预定义搜索方法之一。不可能是 。
        Returns:
        first element that was found using given find method or null if element wasn't found. 使用给定的find方法找到的第一个元素，或者是否找不到元素。

      • evaluate

        XPathResult evaluate(java.lang.String expression)
        Evaluates an XPath expression for the document element with XPathResultType.ANY_TYPE and returns the result. Equivalent of: 
        evaluate(expression, getDocumentElement(), XPathResultType.ANY_TYPE);
        使用XPathResultType.ANY_TYPE评估文档元素的XPath表达式并返回结果。等效于：validate（expression，getDocumentElement（），XPathResultType.ANY_TYPE）;
        Parameters:
        expression - a string representing the XPath to be evaluated. Cannot be null or empty string. -表示要评估的XPath的字符串。不能为或为空字符串。
        Returns:
        XPathResult object of the type specified in the type parameter. The return value will be always a valid XPathResult object. In case of incorrect expression, the result object will contain information about evaluation error. See the XPathResult.isError() and XPathResult.getErrorMessage() methods. 参数中指定类型的对象。返回值将始终是有效对象。如果表达式不正确，结果对象将包含有关评估错误的信息。请参见和方法。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when expression is null or empty string.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the document element is not available in the current document.

      • evaluate

        XPathResult evaluate(java.lang.String expression,
                     XPathResultType type)
        Returns an XPathResult based on an XPath expression and other given parameters.
        根据XPath表达式和其他给定参数返回XPathResult。
        Parameters:
        expression - a string representing the XPath to be evaluated. Cannot be null or empty string. -表示要评估的XPath的字符串。不能为或为空字符串。
        type - type of result XPathResult to return. See XPathResultType. Cannot be null. -要返回的结果XPathResult的类型。请参阅。不可能是 。
        Returns:
        XPathResult object of the type specified in the type parameter. The return value will be always a valid XPathResult object. In case of incorrect expression, the result object will contain information about evaluation error. See the XPathResult.isError() and XPathResult.getErrorMessage() methods. 参数中指定类型的对象。返回值将始终是有效对象。如果表达式不正确，结果对象将包含有关评估错误的信息。请参见和方法。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when expression is null or empty string; when contextNode is null; when type is null.
